name: Archon Justice
text: Attacking you during your period of vigilance opens foes up to allies’ strikes.
prerequisites: Archon Diversion; Archon Style; Combat Expertise; Combat Reflexes; base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.
benefit: You no longer take a penalty to AC for using Archon Style to grant nearby allies a bonus to AC, and you can activate this effect as a swift action or a move action. Whenever you take damage from an attack you diverted to yourself using Archon Diversion, each ally threatening the attacking creature can make an attack of opportunity against that creature.
text_zh: 在你警戒期间攻击你会让敌人受到盟友的攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 神使援护，神使之型，寓守于攻，战斗反射，BAB+8或武僧等级7。
benefit_zh: 你不再因为使用神使之型为邻接的盟友提供AC加值而受到AC减值，且你能以迅捷动作或移动动作激活此效果。每当你因使用神使援护后转移给自己的攻击而受到伤害时，每个威胁发起这次攻击生物的盟友都可以对该生物进行借机攻击。
